msg.msgText: An argument is not valid: Name: {0}.

msgExplanation.p:
There are several possible causes for this error.
For the Message Gateway administration interface, the requested action is not valid or the request is out of order.
For the Message Gateway command line interface (CLI), the argument from the command line request is not valid.
If the error code is from the Message Gateway client or server component, this is an internal error.

ul.li: For the Message Gateway administration interface, ensure that the requested action is in order.
For the Message Gateway command line interface (CLI), ensure that the arguments are valid.
If the error code is from the Message Gateway client or server, contact IBM support.
